text: Miguel Carol (born June 26, 1962 in Madrid) is a swimmer from Spain. He has a disability and is an S3 type swimmer. He raced at the 1968 Summer Paralympics. He came in first in one swimming race and second in a different swimming race. == References == Category:Spanish swimmers Category:Living people Category:1962 births Category:Paralympic silver medalists for Spain Category:Sportspeople from Madrid Category:1968 Summer Paralympics Category:Sportspeople with disabilities, type S3
title: Miguel Carol
